title: On Boarding Paywall Elements
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A user has installed MLB on an iOS device
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user navigates through the welcome, favorite team, and notifications pages

AND

+ The user is presented with the mlb.tv paywall on the home page
custom_expected:
THEN

The paywall will include:

+ The MLB.tv logo
+ "The Home of Streaming Baseball" copy
+ Each available SKU to purchase
+ Blackout and restriction copy under SKUs
+ Restore Purchase button
+ Login button

title: Free App
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user installs the MLB app and taps SKIP on the top-right of the welcome page

AND

+ The user can skip through the Follow Teams and Notifications pages
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The onboarding paywall displays once the user is navigated to the home page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user can tap on the "X" button on the top-right of the paywall to dismiss it

AND

+ The mlb.tv upsell banner is displayed on the Watch page

AND

+ When tapped, subscriber content will bring up the mlb.tv paywall

title: Subscriber Login
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the MLB.tv paywall
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Tapping on the Log In button at the bottom of the paywall
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Tap the "Done" button on the top-right if the user wishes to exit the Log In page and return to the paywall

OR

+ The user can select the Sign Up button to create a new account

OR 

+ The user can tap the "Login without password or reset password" option to send a recovery email

OR

+ The user can input their Email and Password and select Log In to successfully navigate the app signed-in

OR 

+ The user will receive an error message if their credentials are incorrect

title: Audio Paywall
custom_preconds:
Given

+ The user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user taps on the audio EPG headphones icon on the Scores or Watch page

OR

+ The user taps on the Audio option in the Browse menu (Hamburger icon on top-right of the Home, Standings, and News pages)
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLB.tv paywall with audio-only options will be shown

title: Audio-Only IAP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A non-entitled user is navigating the paywall
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Selecting a SKU for either a Monthly or Yearly audio-only subscription
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user can input their Apple ID credentials

AND

+ Elect to connect an MLB account to a successful anonymous purchase

AND

+ Have access to archived and live audio streams from the Audio EPG menu

AND

+ Successfully playback is achieved

title: MLB.TV IAP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the MLB paywall
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Tapping on the MLB.tv Monthly option SKU
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be asked to enter their Apple ID & Password

or

+ Confirm subscription if the user is logged into an Apple ID already

AND

+ After confirming a successful purchase, the user is able to launch MLB audio-only and tv broadcasts from Scores, Watch, Home, and team pages.

title: MLBN Bundle IAP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the MLB paywall
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Tapping on the MLB Network + At Bat bundle option SKU
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be asked to enter their Apple ID & Password

or

+ Confirm subscription if the user is logged into an Apple ID already

AND

+ After confirming a successful purchase, the user is able to launch MLB audio-only from Scores, Watch, Home, and team pages

AND

+ The user has access to MLB Network content from the Watch tab

title: Linking
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A user has completed a successful IAP of either the MLB.tv, At Bat, or MLBN subscription
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Asked to link their purchase to an MLB account
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user can either log into an account that has already been create or may create a new account to link the purchase to

AND

+ The user will signed in after either inputting their login credentials and selecting "Log In" or inputting new credentials and selecting "Create Account"

OR

+ An error message is displayed if requirements aren't met for email or password

OR

+ The user can elect to skip account linking entirely and utilize the app as an anonymous user

title: Restore
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has an active MLB app subscription linked to their Apple ID
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ Navigating to the app settings page and selecting the "Restore Purchase" option
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A "Success" message will display stating that an existing subscription has been restored and an "Okay" button

AND

+ Users will receive playback of all content they are entitled to

AND

+ Lock icons will dismiss from subscription content avaialable

title: Promo Code Redemption Without MLB App Downloaded
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ User generates prod facing promo code this is done through app store connect (services -> Promo Codes) https://appstoreconnect.apple.com/apps/493619333/features/promo_codes/generate
+ User does NOT have the app downloaded 
+ App must be submitted to apple for review to be able to begin this test
+ User navigates to app store connect and creates promo codes for the appropriate build
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the app store on the device and hits the account button in the upper upper-right corner 
+ The user pushes "Redeem Gift Card or Code" and then selects "Enter Code Manually"
+ The user inputs one of the promo codes they generated
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The app will automatically download and open

title: Promo Code Redemption With MLB App Downloaded
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user generates prod facing promo code this is done through app store connect (services -> Promo Codes) https://appstoreconnect.apple.com/apps/493619333/features/promo_codes/generate

AND

+ The user has the app downloaded
+ The app must be submitted to Apple for review to be able to begin this test
+ The user navigates to the app store connect and creates promo codes for the appropriate build
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the app store on the device and hits the account button in the upper-right corner
+ The user pushes "Redeem Gift Card or Code" and then selects "Enter Code Manually"
+ The user inputs one of the promo codes they generated
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The app will automatically open
